2. The following are endpoints for this company : 

GET
/viewusers
To view all users available

POST
/createuser/<name>/<email>/<gender>
To add new users

UPDATE
/updateuser/<id>/<name>
To update an exisiting user

DELETE
/deleteuser/<id>
To delete an exisiting user

GET
/viewmovies
To get all movies


3. Dependencies
Please install Python 3.8 and Nodejs Ver 12
Please install the requirements.txt in the folder.
